com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.smartrest

Class SmartRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.util.ExtensibleObject
      • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.smartrest.SmartRequest

  • public class SmartRequest
extends ExtensibleObject
    Represents a request to send via SmartREST API.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmartRequest

        public SmartRequest(String xId,
                    String body)
        Constructor to create a new request for SmartREST API. It will have the processing mode PERSISTENT.
        Parameters:
        xId - the X-Id for which this request shall be made. Can be null, omitting the X-Id header, to allow for multiple X-Id ("15,myxid").
        body - a String with newline-separated lines for the request body

      • SmartRequest

        public SmartRequest(String xId,
                    SmartRequest.ProcessingMode processingMode,
                    String body)
        Constructor to create a new request for SmartREST API.
        Parameters:
        xId - the X-Id for which this request shall be made. Can be null, omitting the X-Id header, to allow for multiple X-Id ("15,myxid").
        body - a String with newline-separated lines for the request body
        processingMode - can be SmartRequest.ProcessingMode.TRANSIENT if you just want to pass data for real time processing, which need not be stored in the CoT database.

    • Method Detail

      • getXId

        public String getXId()
        Get the X-Id of the template to use for this request. Can be null if message-ID 15 contained in body for multiple X-Id.
        Returns:
        a String with X-Id which specifies the SmartREST template to use for this request.

      • setXId

        public void setXId(String xId)
        Setting the X-Id of the template to use for this request. Can be left empty if message-ID 15 contained in body for multiple X-Id.
        Parameters:
        xId - a String with X-Id which specifies the SmartREST template to use for this request.

      • getProcessingMode

        public SmartRequest.ProcessingMode getProcessingMode()
        Get the processing mode to use for this request. One of two values are possible: TRANSIENT and PERSISTENT.
        Returns:
        the SmartRequest.ProcessingMode

      • setProcessingMode

        public void setProcessingMode(SmartRequest.ProcessingMode processingMode)
        Setting processing mode to use for this request. Only two values will be accepted: TRANSIENT and PERSISTENT. When left empty, PERSISTENT processing mode will be assumed and used as default.
        Parameters:
        processingMode - the SmartRequest.ProcessingMode

      • getBody

        public String getBody()
        Get the body of the smartREST Request: newline-separated lines for the request body.
        Returns:
        a String with the body of the smartREST Request.

      • setBody

        public void setBody(String body)
        Setting the body of the smartREST Request: a String with newline-separated lines for the request body.
        Parameters:
        body - a String with the body of the smartREST Request.
